text: After a busy day, this ramen spot delivers the perfect meal. The broth is flavorful, noodles have great texture, and toppings are ample. Fast, friendly service and a cozy interior make it ideal for a quick dinner. Highly recommend for anyone craving comforting ramen post-work.
The prices are OK but the portion of meat is miserable. They do provide the usual pickles and sauces, but not at the counter... they are located near the entrance. The taste is average.

Had their karaka ramen again today . Think they served me the wrong ramen? What i got today was different from what i had preciously. The karaka i ate previously had a spicy orangey coloured soup..considered asking the staff but finally decided against it, as the staff on duty wasnt too approachable. Think they need to train their staffs to be more friendly
its nice that the place 24 hour so i cam go there anytime! food is amazing too!!

What a disappointment ! Food is good, but the drink is very slow i done my food about 10-15min but the drink never done then when they calling my number but the other person take my order, he is number 10 and mine is 8 then i asking again about my drink the server say "i think he take ur drink" then? Never help me settle the problem,so lousy the restaurant are.
